/src/lib/env.tsï¼š

import { z } from 'zod';

const envSchema = z.object({
NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL: z.string().url(),
NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY: z.string().min(1),
});

export const env = envSchema.parse({
NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL: process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL,
NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY: process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY,
});
.env.exampleï¼š

Supabase ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆåˆ†é›¢ï¼ˆserver/clientï¼‰
/src/lib/supabase/server.tsï¼š

import { createServerClient } from '@supabase/ssr';
import { cookies } from 'next/headers';
import { env } from '../env';

export function supabaseServer() {
const cookieStore = cookies();
return createServerClient(
env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL,
env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY,
{
cookies: {
get(name) { return cookieStore.get(name)?.value; },
},
},
);
}
/src/lib/supabase/client.tsï¼š

'use client';
import { createClient } from '@supabase/supabase-js';
import type { Database } from '../types/supabase';

import { env } from '../env';

export const supabase = createClient<Database>(
env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL,
env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY,
);

-- æœ‰åŠ¹åŒ–
alter table public.profiles enable row level security;

-- ä¾‹: è‡ªåˆ†ã®è¡Œã®ã¿ SELECT
create policy "read own profile"
on public.profiles for select

-- ä¾‹: è‡ªåˆ†ã®è¡Œã®ã¿ INSERT/UPDATE
create policy "write own profile"
on public.profiles for all

ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿å–å¾—ã¯ React Query ã§çµ±ä¸€
/src/app/(protected)/dashboard/page.tsxï¼ˆClient Componentã®ä¾‹ãƒ»éª¨æ ¼ï¼‰ï¼š

'use client';

import { useQuery } from '@tanstack/react-query';
import { supabase } from '@/lib/supabase/client';

async function fetchMyProfile() {
const { data, error } = await supabase
.from('profiles')
.select('\*')
.eq('user_id', (await supabase.auth.getUser()).data.user?.id)
.single();

if (error) throw error;
return data;
}

export default function DashboardPage() {
const { data, isLoading, error } = useQuery({
queryKey: ['myProfile'],
queryFn: fetchMyProfile,
});

if (isLoading) return <div>Loadingâ€¦</div>;
if (error) return <div>Failed to load</div>;

return <div className="p-6">Hello, {data.display_name}</div>;
}

// features/todo/api/useTodos.ts
import { useQuery } from '@tanstack/react-query';
import { supabase } from '@/lib/supabase';
export function useTodos() {
return useQuery({
queryKey: ['todos'],
queryFn: async () => {
const { data, error } = await supabase.from('todos').select('\*').order('created_at', { ascending: false });
if (error) throw error;
return data;
}
});
}

2. **ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿å–å¾—ã¯ `features/*/api.ts` çµŒç”±**ï¼ˆfetch/Supabaseç›´æ›¸ãç¦æ­¢ï¼‰
3. **çŠ¶æ…‹ãƒ»é€šä¿¡ã¯ `features/*/hooks.ts`ï¼ˆReact Queryï¼‰**

> è¿·ã£ãŸã‚‰ã€Œapp ã¯ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒˆã€ã€Œfeatures ã¯æ©Ÿèƒ½ã€ã€Œshared ã¯å…±é€šã€ã¨ã„ã†3æŠã ã‘ã‚’æ€ã„å‡ºã›ã°OKã€‚

# æœ€å°ã®å‘½åãƒ»ä¾å­˜ã®æŒ‡é‡

- ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆ/å‹ï¼šPascalCaseï¼ˆ`TodoForm`, `TodoItem`, `TodoInput`ï¼‰
- å¤‰æ•°/é–¢æ•°ï¼šcamelCaseï¼ˆ`fetchTodos`, `useTodos`ï¼‰
- å®šæ•°ï¼šUPPER_SNAKE_CASEï¼ˆ`DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE`ï¼‰
- ä¾å­˜ï¼šReactã€TypeScriptã€Tailwindã€@supabase/supabase-jsã€@tanstack/react-queryã€zodã€react-hook-formï¼ˆã“ã“ã¾ã§ã‚’â€œåœŸå°â€ã¨æ˜è¨˜ï¼‰

# ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ï¼ˆTodo æ©Ÿèƒ½ã®éª¨æ ¼ï¼‰

`features/todo/api.ts`

```ts
import { supabase } from '@/shared/lib/supabase';
import type { Database } from '@/shared/types/supabase';
import { todoInputSchema } from './schema';

type Tables = Database['public']['Tables'];
export type Todo = Tables['todos']['Row'];

export async function listTodos(): Promise<Todo[]> {
  const { data, error } = await supabase
    .from('todos')
    .select('*')
    .order('created_at', { ascending: false });
  if (error) throw error;
  return data ?? [];
}

export async function addTodo(input: unknown): Promise<Todo> {
  const parsed = todoInputSchema.parse(input);
  const { data, error } = await supabase
    .from('todos')
    .insert({ title: parsed.title })
    .select()
    .single();
  if (error) throw error;
  return data;
}
```

`features/todo/hooks.ts`

```ts
import { useMutation, useQuery, useQueryClient } from '@tanstack/react-query';
import { addTodo, listTodos } from './api';

export function useTodos() {
  return useQuery({ queryKey: ['todos'], queryFn: listTodos });
}

export function useAddTodo() {
  const qc = useQueryClient();
  return useMutation({
    mutationFn: addTodo,
    onSuccess: () => qc.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['todos'] }),
  });
}
```

`features/todo/schema.ts`

```ts
import { z } from 'zod';
export const todoInputSchema = z.object({ title: z.string().min(1).max(100) });
export type TodoInput = z.infer<typeof todoInputSchema>;
```

`app/todos/page.tsx`

```tsx
'use client';
import { useTodos, useAddTodo } from '@/features/todo/hooks';
import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
import { todoInputSchema, type TodoInput } from '@/features/todo/schema';

export default function TodosPage() {
  const { data } = useTodos();
  const add = useAddTodo();
  const { register, handleSubmit, reset } = useForm<TodoInput>({
    resolver: zodResolver(todoInputSchema),
  });

  return (
    <div className="space-y-4 p-6">
      <form
        onSubmit={handleSubmit(async (v) => {
          await add.mutateAsync(v);
          reset();
        })}
        className="flex gap-2"
      >
        <input
          {...register('title')}
          className="w-full rounded border px-3 py-2"
          placeholder="Add todo"
        />
        <button className="rounded border px-4 py-2">Add</button>
      </form>

      <ul className="space-y-2">
        {data?.map((t) => (
          <li key={t.id} className="rounded border px-3 py-2">
            {t.title}
          </li>
        ))}
      </ul>
    </div>
  );
}
```
